segments.text: Do you really think we can beat WebTracker ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How can you be so sure ? Do you know something I don't ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have a plan for handling WebTracker . Step one is the Stars.com contract .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't worry about that , Dave . Look , I have to see Vince now . Think about what I said .
segments.speaker: S2
